S2SA.name: Sequence - to - sequence framework
S2SA.from sentence: ( 1 ) S2SA : Sequence - to - sequence framework has been proposed for language generation task .

implement.from sentence: ( 2 ) S2SAR : We implement a simple method which can incorporate the review information when generating the answer .

two - stage state - of - the - art model.from sentence: ( 3 ) SNet : S- Net is a two - stage state - of - the - art model which extracts some text spans from multiple documents context and synthesis the answer from those spans .

QS.from sentence: ( 4 ) QS : We implement the query - based summarization model proposed by Hasselqvist et al ..

bag - of - words retrieval function.from sentence: ( 5 ) BM25 : BM25 is a bag - of - words retrieval function that ranks a set of reviews based on the question terms appearing in each review .

TF - IDF.name: Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency
TF - IDF.from sentence: ( 6 ) TF - IDF : Term Frequency - Inverse Document Frequency is a numerical statistic that is intended to reflect how important a question word is to a review .
